summary: Changes the Smithing Actor Value to default 1.5 values
descriptionHtml:
============================
Skyrim 1.5 update Smithing Fix
============================

Changes the Smithing Actor Value to default 1.5 values for those with the levelling conflict.

Make sure this loads after any perk and/or smithing mods. If in doubt put it at the end of the load list.

Hopefully any conflicting mods will get fixed and this will become redundant but this should work until then.

Hope this was helpful
author: SteelChi
